title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Web-Based Delphi Simulation for Enhancing Project Manager Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply 35 or more of the 42 key success factors in project management in a real-world simulation environment.
Learners can reach team consensus with 80% or higher accuracy using a web-based Delphi technique.
In complex project scenarios, learners are evaluated on over 30 of 42 core competencies in VR simulations and achieve scores of 85 or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
